name: The Fast and the Flatulent
description:
The Fast and the Flatulent

My submission for Ludum Dare #31

You're a guy playing a game in a video arcade. But you get distracted by all sorts of things.

Try to get the highest score on the arcade machine!

Ludum Dare page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=p...
